svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="790" width="505" x="125" y="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-2" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="335" width="460" x="147.5" y="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-3" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="<div><span>type Book {</span></div><div><span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id: ID!</span><br></span></div><div><span><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	title: String</span><br></span></span></div><div><span><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">author: String</span></div><div>}</div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div>type Query {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	getBooks: [Book]</span></div><div>}</div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div>type Mutation {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	createBook(id: ID!, title: String, author: String): Book!</span><br></div><div>}</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="295" width="430" x="162.5" y="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-5" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#007FFF;strokeWidth=2;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="156" x="186" y="365" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-6" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#007FFF;strokeWidth=2;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="404" x="186" y="459" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-7" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="320" width="462.5" x="147.5" y="570" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-9" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="<div>const resolvers = {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	Query: {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getBooks: () =&gt; {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	//DBなどから全てのBookを取得</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return 取得したBookの配列;</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	Mutation: {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	createBook: (_, args) =&gt; {</span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	const { id, title, author } = args;</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	//DBなどへのBookの登録</span><br></span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return 作成したBook;</span><br></span></span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div>}</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="295" width="430" x="160" y="580" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-10" edge="1" parent="1" source="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-6" rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 228px; margin-left: 40px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
実はこれらのフィールドに対しての値を取得する関数 (=リゾルバ)もある
→ デフォルトリゾルバと呼ばれる
リゾルバが用意されている
